hive.value: KeychainManager Analysis: 772-line monolithic class violating SRP. Key issues: (1) God Object pattern - handles storage/encryption/migration/biometrics, (2) Unnecessary @MainActor blocking UI thread, (3) Tight coupling to CryptoKit, (4) Mixed abstraction levels. Strategy: Decompose into 8 focused services: KeychainStorageService, SecurityValidator, EncryptionService, BiometricService, MigrationService, TokenManager, DataTransformation, and slim KeychainManager coordinator. Priority: Extract core storage first, remove @MainActor, isolate security validation. Target: <200 lines per class, >90% test coverage, no performance regression.
